page.title: 04HOSPITAL VISIT,STEVENAGE
page.content: When I broke my arm I had to go to the accident department in Lister Hospital.When you go in the nurse gives you a card which you take to the doctor. When the doctor calls you into the room he looks at your arm and decides if you need an x-ray or not. If you do you go into a room and put your arm on the table and a camera takes a picture of the inside of your arm. Then if your arm is broken a man puts your arm in plaster.The plaster takes 36-48 hours to dry.Then you have to go back in 3 to 6 weeks to have the plaster taken off.
